caption.p: Impact on the induction ratio in SOS/ umuC test of (a) methanolic extracts; (b) ethanolic extracts; (c) aqueous extracts, at the concentrations of 0.125, 0.25 and 0.5 mg/mL. MetOH and EtOH – controls for methanol and ethanol, respectively. * - statistically significant decrease of DNA damage compared with the negative control (H 2O 2).
